questions.name: template_7

NLquestions: What is/are_the_ /numbers_of_days with__ Wind or Temperature in__ ==,== in_2022 ?

questions.name: template_8
questions.sql: SELECT Year, avg(Value) AS avg_Value, max(Value) AS max_Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2020') OR (Year = '2021')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Calm') OR (Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = 'Breeze') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Storm') OR (Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = '0-10')) GROUP BY Year
